inlinePayload.name: get_my_bookings__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Get user's travel bookings from their account including flights, hotels, and car rentals. Returns booking confirmations, status, dates, prices and details.

status.description: Filter bookings by status: 'all', 'confirmed', 'pending', or 'cancelled'. Default is 'all'.

inlinePayload.name: get_loyalty_status__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Get user's loyalty program status across airlines, hotels, and car rental companies. Returns tier status, points/miles balance, benefits, and progress to next tier.

inlinePayload.name: get_saved_travelers__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Get saved traveler profiles for quick booking including passport information, known traveler numbers, Global Entry status, and contact details.

inlinePayload.name: get_travel_preferences__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Get user's saved travel preferences including preferred airlines, seat preferences, hotel chains, room types, car rental preferences and notification settings.

inlinePayload.name: get_past_trips__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Get user's travel history with destinations, dates, costs, ratings and notes. Useful for recommendations and expense tracking.

limit.description: Maximum number of past trips to return. Default is 5.

inlinePayload.name: get_saved_payment_methods__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Get user's saved payment methods including credit cards with masked numbers, expiry dates, and billing addresses for quick checkout.

inlinePayload.name: get_travel_credits__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Get user's available travel credits, vouchers and refunds including amounts, expiry dates, restrictions and originating bookings.

inlinePayload.name: get_upcoming_trips__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Get user's upcoming confirmed trips with departure dates, destinations, booking status, total costs and travel preparation checklist.

inlinePayload.name: update_traveler_profile__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Update traveler profile information such as passport details, contact information, preferences or loyalty program numbers.

traveler_id.description: ID of the traveler profile to update.

passport_expiry.description: Updated passport expiry in YYYY-MM-DD format. Optional.

inlinePayload.name: request_travel_approval__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Submit a corporate travel request for manager approval with destination, dates, estimated costs and business justification.

estimated_cost.description: Estimated total trip cost in USD.

business_justification.description: Business reason and justification for the trip.

inlinePayload.name: search_flights__public
inlinePayload.description: Search for available flights between cities with pricing, airlines, departure/arrival times, duration, stops and amenities. Essential for flight booking.

return_date.description: Return date in YYYY-MM-DD format for round-trip. Optional for one-way.

inlinePayload.name: search_hotels__public
inlinePayload.description: Search for available hotels with pricing, ratings, amenities, room types and cancellation policies. Returns options sorted by rating and price.

location.description: City or area to search for hotels (e.g., 'New York', 'Paris, France').

guests.description: Number of guests per room. Default is 2.

rooms.description: Number of rooms needed. Default is 1.

inlinePayload.name: search_car_rentals__public
inlinePayload.description: Search for available car rentals with pricing, vehicle types, features, mileage limits and insurance options. Compare rental companies and vehicles.

pickup_location.description: Pickup location (city, airport code, or address).

car_type.description: Preferred car type: 'economy', 'compact', 'midsize', 'suv', 'luxury', or 'any'. Default is 'any'.

inlinePayload.name: get_airport_info__public
inlinePayload.description: Get detailed information about an airport including name, location, terminals, facilities, transportation options, parking and contact information.

inlinePayload.name: check_visa_requirements__public
inlinePayload.description: Check visa requirements for international travel including visa type, processing time, cost, required documents and application procedures.

destination_country.description: Destination country to check visa requirements for.

trip_duration_days.description: Planned trip duration in days. Default is 7.

inlinePayload.name: get_destination_weather__public
inlinePayload.description: Get weather forecast for travel destination including temperature, conditions, precipitation chance and packing suggestions for up to 7 days.

location.description: City or destination to get weather forecast for.

date.description: Start date for forecast in YYYY-MM-DD format. Default is today.

inlinePayload.name: get_currency_exchange__public
inlinePayload.description: Get current currency exchange rates and convert amounts between currencies. Includes tips for best exchange methods and travel money advice.

inlinePayload.name: find_attractions__public
inlinePayload.description: Find tourist attractions and activities at a destination including museums, landmarks, parks, entertainment with ratings, prices, hours and descriptions.

location.description: City or destination to find attractions in.

category.description: Filter by category: 'museum', 'landmark', 'park', 'entertainment', 'shopping', 'food_tour', 'adventure', or 'all'. Default is 'all'.

top_n.description: Number of top attractions to return. Default is 10.

inlinePayload.name: search_restaurants__public
inlinePayload.description: Search for restaurants at destination with ratings, cuisine types, price ranges, specialties, features and reservation information.

location.description: City or area to search for restaurants.

cuisine.description: Type of cuisine (e.g., 'Italian', 'Japanese', 'Mexican', 'French'). Use 'any' for all cuisines. Default is 'any'.

price_range.description: Price range: '$', '$$', '$$$', or '$$$$'. Use 'any' for all ranges. Default is 'any'.

inlinePayload.name: get_travel_alerts__public
inlinePayload.description: Get travel advisories, safety information, health alerts, emergency contacts and local laws for destination. Essential for trip planning and safety.

destination.description: Destination country or city to check travel alerts for.

inlinePayload.name: calculate_trip_cost__public
inlinePayload.description: Estimate total trip cost including flights, accommodation, food, activities and transportation. Returns breakdown by category and daily average.

inlinePayload.name: get_local_transportation__public
inlinePayload.description: Get information about local transportation options including public transit, taxis, ride-sharing, bike-sharing with pricing, hours and tips.

destination.description: City or destination to get transportation information for.

inlinePayload.name: find_travel_insurance__public
inlinePayload.description: Find and compare travel insurance options with coverage details, prices, benefits, deductibles and recommendations based on trip details.

trip_cost.description: Total trip cost to insure in USD.

inlinePayload.name: get_packing_checklist__public
inlinePayload.description: Generate a comprehensive packing checklist based on destination, duration, season and trip type. Includes essentials, clothing, toiletries and packing tips.

destination.description: Trip destination to generate packing list for.

trip_type.description: Type of trip: 'leisure', 'business', 'adventure', or 'beach'. Default is 'leisure'.
